item.description:
Join in any time you like!

This Meetup will be cross-posted with Fun with Alcohol and Social Fun.

A Pub Hop is British for Pub Crawl. Or should we make it a pub TROT?

 http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=L9nXfffeAIU

(When Monty Python's Holy Grail first came out, people would trot from place to place in Harvard Sq. knocking coconuts.)

PLEASE WEAR HATS INDOORS. If you are with these meetups, LOOK FOR EACH OTHER. WEAR HATS INDOORS and know you are with the meetups.

Here is the schedule (MAY CHANGE)!

--5:00 Tommy Doyles on Winthrop St. We'll go to either the 2nd fl. or downstairs from the 1st.

--6:00 Grendels Den-- across the St. They have an amazing half price menu for apps and food, with the purchase of a $3.50 drink (special good from 5:00 until 7:30). Get there at 5:00 if you want to order food. It gets crowded Sat's.

http://www.grendelsden.com/menu/halfprice.h...

--7:00 Pizzeria Uno's on JFK St. Downstairs there is a full bar. Also upstairs you can order a pizza if you want to but it will be busy, so try to get a table together if you eat.

--8:00 John Harvards Brewhouse on Dunster St. They brew their own beer, and you can order beer flights (a sampler) for the same price as a draft.

We will not always be seated because we like to mingle.

PLEASE BRING CASH! PLEASE MAINTAIN YOUR OWN TAB!

Parking is available at the Charles Hotel Parking garage. Public transit, red line T (recommended).
item.how_to_find_us: Wear hats, look for people with hats.
item.name: Mini Pub Hop-- Harvard Sq.
